role_arn.title: AWS Role ARN
role_arn.description: Optional IAM role to assume for accessing AWS.

external_id.title: External ID
external_id.description: External ID used when assuming the role.

num_workers.title: Number of Workers
num_workers.description: Number of concurrent workers for fetching IAM data. Higher values may improve performance but could hit AWS rate limits.

aws_region.title: AWS Region
aws_region.description: The AWS region to connect to. Defaults to 'us-east-1'.
